description:
If you are looking to get into a great college or University you will need an excellent ACT score and this course will help you get that higher ACT math score that you need and want.

You can complete this course all in one sitting or break it up into parts whichever works better for you.

In this course we will be covering 21 key concept areas that are covered on the math portion of the ACT exam to assist you in boosting your Math ACT score.

  • There will be a teaching segment for each area where we will discuss important formulas and background information that you need to know.
  • You will have opportunities to pause the video and work on solving examples independently. We will then go over these examples together and I will show you how to solve them effectively and efficiently.
  • Each lesson you will be provided with a worksheet with problems for additional practice and an answer key to check your answers to further reinforce what you have learned.
As a private professional math tutor, I have worked individually with hundreds of students helping them prepare for the Math portion of the ACT. I know the stumbling blocks that students have with the test and common mistakes that are made. By being able to recognize what is being asked for in a given problem you will be able to take the correct approach and use the correct formula(s) to solve the problem. I will give you the tips and insights that you need to be more confident, faster, and most importantly accurate, thus boosting your score and helping you get into your desired College or University. Join the course now and let's get started learning.
title: ACT Math
